Class Building

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Cell
          Building
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Selectable
public abstract class Building
extends Cell

Buildings are utilized by the Units as they provide multiple assets. For example, a defense or etc.

Version:
Beta 2.0
Author:
Alston Lin
